content: {"name": "Salvation Army - Citadel ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call in advance to get appointment before visiting pantry The number to call would be 2157225447 ext 3", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/eastern-pennsylvania/philadelphia-citadel/alleviate-hunger/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5830 Rising Sun Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19120", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0437362, "longitude": -75.1034261}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 722-5447", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
